description: Demande de propositions pour la fourniture de câbles RF.
full_summary:
# RF Cable Tender Notice
## Request for Proposal (RFP)
Request for Proposal: Fisheries and Oceans Canada seeks qualified suppliers to provide RF Cable and equipment under Supply Arrangement E60HN-16ELEC electrical products in the Atlantic region.

### Tender Details

| **Parameter** | **Value** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| **Tender Reference Number** | `cb-764-9295012` |  |
| **Amendment Number** | `6` | Supplemental information available |
| **Solicitation Number** | `30004833` |  |
| **Publication Date** | November 23, 2023 |  |
| **Tender Closing Date** | December 11, 2023  2:00 pm EST | **Note:** Updated closing date. |
| **Expected Contract Start Date** | December 15, 2023 |  |
| **Expected Contract End Date** | March 31, 2024 |  |

### Classifications

* **Procurement Category**: Government Department (GD)
* **UNSPSC**: `26121600 - Electrical cable and accessories`
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective tendering
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

### Contact Information

* **Contact Person**: Meenu Bhatia
* **Email**: [meenu.bhatia@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:meenu.bhatia@dfo-mpo.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: (613) 298-4795
* **Address**: 200 Kent Street, Ottawa, ON, K1A0E6, Canada

### Available Documents
You can view and download the tender documents from the link below:
* English: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25740/30004833---npp_en.pdf>
* French: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25740/30004833---npp_fr_0.pdf>
